Hi there,

This is an Derby embedded driver exception. It usually happens when two applications/threads want to visit one database. As per Derby driver's restriction, one database can only be visited by one application/thread at a time.

The suggestion to your problem is that you may user Derby Network server driver which allow concurrent access to the database. For details please refer to Derby online manual http://db.apache.org/derby/docs/10.3/getstart/

Thanks.
Lin
